name: aurora-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
